Text: MSDN Flash Volume Number October MSDN Flash All the developer news from Microsoft in one email For more information tools and community resources visit MSDN Online at Last week you may have received a Special MSDN Flash which identified you as a past Developer Days attendee and indicated you are not currently subscribed to our regular MSDN Flash newsletter Although the salutation identified recipients as being Dev Day event attendees the message was intended for all recipients Receiving this email indicates that you are subscribed to the MSDN Flash email newsletter We hope you will be able to attend the Dev Days event on November or To cancel your subscription to this newsletter or stop all newsletters from microsoftcom read the directions at the bottom of this message
